name: iPhone 15 Pro
description: Apple flagship phone with A17 Bionic chip.

reviews.title: Worth every penny!
reviews.comment: The A17 chip is incredibly fast and the camera quality is outstanding. Battery life could be better though.

reviews.title: Great upgrade from 13 Pro
reviews.comment: Noticeable improvement in performance and camera. Dynamic Island is more useful than I expected.

reviews.title: Good but expensive
reviews.comment: It's a great phone but not sure it's worth the premium over last year's model.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24
description: Latest Android with AI-enhanced features.

reviews.title: AI features are game-changing
reviews.comment: The real-time translation and photo editing tools are incredible. Battery lasts all day with moderate use.

reviews.title: Overheating issues
reviews.comment: Gets uncomfortably warm during extended camera use. AI features are impressive when they work.

reviews.title: Perfect for productivity
reviews.comment: The DeX mode combined with AI scheduling makes this my perfect work companion.

name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
description: Pure Android experience with advanced camera.

reviews.title: Best smartphone camera
reviews.comment: The computational photography is unmatched. Night Sight works miracles in low light.

reviews.title: Battery life terrible
reviews.comment: Great camera but can't make it through a full day. Had to return it.

name: iphone 16
description: Fast charging and high refresh display.

reviews.title: Future-proof device
reviews.comment: The 120Hz display makes everything so smooth. Fast charging is a game changer.

reviews.title: Overpriced
reviews.comment: Great phone but not enough new features to justify the price jump from last year.

name: Xiaomi 14 Ultra
description: High-end phone with Leica camera.

reviews.title: Leica partnership delivers
reviews.comment: The camera system rivals dedicated point-and-shoots. The 1-inch sensor makes a huge difference.

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Hardware is top-notch but MIUI still has some software quirks that need ironing out.

name: Sony Xperia 5 V
description: Compact phone with excellent audio & camera.

reviews.title: Best audio quality
reviews.comment: The headphone jack with high-res audio support is amazing. Camera pro controls are fantastic.

reviews.title: Perfect size
reviews.comment: Finally a flagship that fits comfortably in one hand. Battery life is surprisingly good.

name: Asus ROG Phone 7
description: Gaming smartphone with high refresh rate.

reviews.title: Ultimate gaming phone
reviews.comment: 165Hz display and shoulder buttons make this unbeatable for gaming. Cooling system works great.

reviews.title: Too bulky
reviews.comment: Great for gaming but too heavy and thick for everyday use. Camera is mediocre.

name: MacBook Pro 16‚Äù M3
description: Powerful laptop for professionals.

reviews.title: Absolute beast of a machine
reviews.comment: Renders 4K video like it's nothing. The display is stunning and the battery life is unreal for this performance.

reviews.title: Perfect for development work
reviews.comment: Compiles code in seconds and can handle dozens of Chrome tabs plus Docker containers without breaking a sweat.

reviews.title: Overkill for most students
reviews.comment: Incredible machine but probably more power than most students need. Gets warm during intensive tasks.

name: Dell XPS 13 Plus
description: Premium ultrabook with edge-to-edge display.

reviews.title: Stunning display
reviews.comment: The 4K touchscreen is perfect for design work. Keyboard takes some getting used to but is excellent.

reviews.title: Ultra-portable power
reviews.comment: Incredibly light yet powerful. Battery lasts through international flights.

name: HP Spectre x360
description: Convertible laptop with touch screen.

reviews.title: Great for digital art
reviews.comment: The pen support and convertible form factor make this ideal for sketching and note-taking.

reviews.title: Overheats under load
reviews.comment: Gets uncomfortably hot during video calls. Fan noise is distracting in quiet environments.

name: Asus ROG Zephyrus G14
description: Gaming laptop with AMD Ryzen chip.

reviews.title: Portable powerhouse
reviews.comment: Plays all modern games at high settings despite its compact size. AniMe Matrix display is a fun bonus.

reviews.title: Battery life terrible
reviews.comment: Lasts less than 2 hours when gaming. Keyboard backlighting is inconsistent.

name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon
description: Business laptop with great battery life.

reviews.title: Best business laptop
reviews.comment: Keyboard is unmatched. Lightweight yet durable. Battery easily lasts a full workday.

reviews.title: Good but overpriced
reviews.comment: Excellent build quality but performance doesn't justify the premium price.

name: Acer Swift 5
description: Lightweight and affordable ultrabook.

reviews.title: Perfect for students
reviews.comment: Weighs nothing yet handles all my coursework. Charges quickly too.

reviews.title: Great travel companion
reviews.comment: Light enough to carry all day. Screen could be brighter for outdoor use.

name: MSI Stealth 15
description: Slim gaming laptop with RTX graphics.

reviews.title: Perfect balance
reviews.comment: Powerful enough for gaming and video editing, yet portable enough to carry daily.

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Runs all my games smoothly but gets loud under heavy load.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Noise-cancelling wireless headphones.

reviews.title: Best ANC headphones I've owned
reviews.comment: Completely eliminates airplane noise. Comfortable for long flights. Sound quality is excellent.

reviews.title: Great but not perfect
reviews.comment: Noise cancellation is top-notch but the bass could be tighter. Very comfortable for extended wear.

name: Apple AirPods Pro 2
description: Wireless earbuds with active noise cancelling.

reviews.title: Perfect for Apple ecosystem
reviews.comment: Seamless switching between devices. Transparency mode is incredibly natural sounding.

reviews.title: Limited functionality
reviews.comment: Many features don't work properly with Android. Sound quality is good but not great for the price.

name: Bose QuietComfort 45
description: Comfortable headphones with great sound.

reviews.title: Most comfortable headphones
reviews.comment: Can wear these for hours without discomfort. Sound signature is balanced and pleasant.

reviews.title: Good but dated
reviews.comment: Sound quality is excellent but lacks modern features like wear detection or multi-point pairing.

name: Sennheiser Momentum 4
description: High-quality wireless headphones.

reviews.title: Best sound quality
reviews.comment: The most natural sounding wireless headphones I've tried. Battery life is incredible.

reviews.title: ANC could be better
reviews.comment: Sound is amazing but noise cancellation isn't as strong as competitors.

name: Nothing Ear (2)
description: Stylish transparent wireless earbuds.

reviews.title: Unique and great
reviews.comment: Love the transparent design. Sound quality is surprisingly good for the price.

reviews.title: Good but not perfect
reviews.comment: Cool design but fit could be better. Touch controls are sometimes unresponsive.

name: Jabra Elite 7 Pro
description: Earbuds with excellent mic quality.

reviews.title: Best for calls
reviews.comment: Microphone quality is unmatched. Perfect for work calls and meetings.

reviews.title: Average sound
reviews.comment: Great for calls but music sounds flat compared to competitors.

name: Beats Studio Pro
description: Bass-heavy over-ear headphones.

reviews.title: Powerful bass
reviews.comment: If you love bass-heavy music, these are perfect. Very comfortable too.

reviews.title: Not balanced
reviews.comment: Too much bass overwhelms mids and highs. Better options at this price.

name: iPad Pro M2
description: Apple's most powerful tablet.

reviews.title: Perfect for artists
reviews.comment: Apple Pencil experience is unmatched. Display is gorgeous and performance is flawless.

reviews.title: Overkill for most
reviews.comment: Too expensive for just browsing and streaming. iPad Air is better value.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9
description: Premium Android tablet with AMOLED display.

reviews.title: Best Android tablet
reviews.comment: AMOLED screen is stunning. Dex mode makes it almost laptop-replacement capable.

reviews.title: Software issues
reviews.comment: Hardware is great but Android still isn't optimized well for tablets.

name: Lenovo Tab P12 Pro
description: High-end tablet with pen support.

reviews.title: Great for work
reviews.comment: Keyboard cover makes this a legit laptop alternative. Screen is huge and beautiful.

reviews.title: Too big
reviews.comment: Excellent for media consumption but awkward to hold for long periods.

name: Amazon Fire HD 10
description: Affordable media consumption tablet.

reviews.title: Amazing value
reviews.comment: Perfect for reading and streaming. Can't beat it at this price.

reviews.title: Limited by Fire OS
reviews.comment: Hardware is decent but the software is too locked down.

name: Microsoft Surface Pro 9
description: Tablet-laptop hybrid with Windows.

reviews.title: Perfect hybrid
reviews.comment: Runs full Windows apps with tablet convenience. Type Cover is excellent.

reviews.title: Good but expensive
reviews.comment: Pen experience is good but not as good as iPad. Battery life could be better.

name: Xiaomi Pad 6
description: Budget-friendly Android tablet.

reviews.title: Best budget tablet
reviews.comment: Incredible performance for the price. Screen is much better than expected.

reviews.title: Great for media
reviews.comment: Perfect for Netflix and YouTube. Speakers are surprisingly good.

name: Huawei MatePad Pro
description: Stylish tablet with M-Pencil support.

reviews.title: Beautiful device
reviews.comment: The design and build quality are premium. M-Pencil works great for sketching.

reviews.title: App limitations
reviews.comment: Hardware is excellent but lack of Google services is a dealbreaker for many apps.

name: HUAWEI Watch GT 4
description: 46mm AMOLED display, up to 14-day battery life, TruSeen 5.5+ heart rate monitoring, 100+ workout modes, Bluetooth calling, compatible with Android/iOS.

reviews.title: Best battery life
reviews.comment: Lasts 2 weeks with always-on display. GPS tracking is accurate and health metrics are comprehensive.

reviews.title: Limited smart features
reviews.comment: Great fitness tracker but lacks advanced smartwatch capabilities.

name: Amazfit GTS 4 Mini
description: 1.65" AMOLED display, 200+ watch faces, GPS, 5ATM waterproof, 15-day battery life, blood oxygen/heart rate monitoring, 120+ sports modes.

reviews.title: Incredible value
reviews.comment: AMOLED screen at this price is amazing. Battery life is as advertised.

reviews.title: Great for running
reviews.comment: Lightweight and accurate GPS. Screen is bright enough for outdoor use.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch6
description: 44mm Bluetooth, sapphire crystal glass, 3-in-1 bio sensor (heart rate/ECG/blood pressure), sleep coaching, 40+ workout tracking, IP68 waterproof.

reviews.title: Best Android smartwatch
reviews.comment: Seamless integration with Samsung phones. Health tracking is comprehensive and accurate.

reviews.title: Limited with iPhone
reviews.comment: Many features don't work properly when paired with an iPhone.

name: Xiaomi Redmi Watch 3 Active
description: 1.83" LCD display, SpO2 monitoring, 5ATM waterproof, 121 sports modes, 12-day battery life, Bluetooth 5.3, lightweight design (37g).

reviews.title: Amazing for the price
reviews.comment: Tracks all my workouts accurately. Screen is big and bright.

reviews.title: Basic but good
reviews.comment: Doesn't have advanced smart features but great as a fitness tracker.

name: Garmin Venu Sq 2
description: AMOLED display, advanced sleep monitoring, stress tracking, GPS, 11-day battery, animated workouts, women's health tracking, contactless payments.

reviews.title: Perfect for active lifestyle
reviews.comment: GPS is incredibly accurate. Battery lasts through multi-day hikes.

reviews.title: Great health insights
reviews.comment: Helped me understand my sleep and stress patterns. Animated workouts are helpful.

name: Fitbit Versa 4
description: Built-in GPS, 40+ exercise modes, sleep score, SpO2 tracking, 6+ day battery, Amazon Alexa, water resistant to 50m, health metrics dashboard.

reviews.title: Best health tracking
reviews.comment: Sleep tracking is incredibly accurate. Love the readiness score feature.

reviews.title: Limited smart features
reviews.comment: Great fitness tracker but not a full smartwatch. Alexa integration is spotty.

name: Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen)
description: Retina OLED display, crash detection, heart rate notifications, water resistant 50m, GPS/GNSS, 18hr battery, iOS compatible, aluminum case.

reviews.title: Perfect iPhone companion
reviews.comment: Seamless integration with iOS. Crash detection gives peace of mind.

reviews.title: Great starter Apple Watch
reviews.comment: Does everything I need at a more affordable price than the Series 9.

name: Redragon M711 Cobra RGB Gaming Mouse
description: 7 programmable buttons, Pixart PMW3325 sensor (up to 10,000 DPI), RGB backlighting with 16.8 million color options, 20 million click lifespan, ergonomic design with anti-slip coating, adjustable weight system (up to 30g added), braided fiber cable.

reviews.title: Best budget gaming mouse
reviews.comment: Precise tracking and comfortable grip. RGB lighting is customizable.

reviews.title: Great for MMOs
reviews.comment: Extra buttons are perfectly placed. Cable is durable and doesn't tangle.

name: Logitech G Pro X Mechanical Keyboard
description: GX Blue clicky switches, detachable USB-C cable, programmable LIGHTSYNC RGB, aircraft-grade aluminum frame, 12-key rollover, tournament-ready design.

reviews.title: Tournament-grade keyboard
reviews.comment: Responsive switches and rock-solid build quality. Perfect for competitive gaming.

reviews.title: Too loud for office
reviews.comment: Great for gaming but the clicky switches are too noisy for shared spaces.

name: ASUS ROG Strix G15 Gaming Laptop
description: 15.6" FHD 144Hz, AMD Ryzen 7 6800H, RTX 3050 4GB, 16GB DDR5, 512GB SSD, RGB keyboard, Windows 11, 90Wh battery, ROG Intelligent Cooling.

reviews.title: Powerful and portable
reviews.comment: Runs all modern games at high settings. Cooling system keeps temps reasonable.

reviews.title: Good but heavy
reviews.comment: Great performance but not ideal to carry around campus daily.

name: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless Headset
description: 2.4GHz wireless + Bluetooth, 38hr battery, ClearCast Gen 2 mic, Sonar software suite, PC/PS5/Android compatible, adjustable headband, 360¬∞ spatial audio.

reviews.title: Best gaming headset
reviews.comment: Incredible sound quality and comfort. Battery lasts through marathon gaming sessions.

reviews.title: Great for PS5
reviews.comment: Works flawlessly with PlayStation. Mic quality is crystal clear.

name: Xbox Wireless Controller - Shock Blue
description: Textured grip, hybrid D-pad, Bluetooth technology, 3.5mm audio jack, custom button mapping, up to 40hr battery life, Xbox Wireless connectivity.

reviews.title: Perfect controller
reviews.comment: Comfortable for long sessions. Buttons have perfect tension. Works great with PC too.

reviews.title: Great but drifts
reviews.comment: Love the feel but developed stick drift after 6 months of heavy use.

name: Acer Nitro 27" Gaming Monitor
description: QHD 2560x1440, 170Hz refresh rate, 1ms VRB, AMD FreeSync Premium, HDR10, 90% DCI-P3, 2xHDMI 2.0, DisplayPort, tilt/swivel/pivot adjustment.

reviews.title: Game changer
reviews.comment: 170Hz makes everything so smooth. Colors are vibrant and response time is instant.

reviews.title: Great for work and play
reviews.comment: Perfect for both gaming and photo editing. HDR could be better though.

name: HyperX Cloud Alpha Gaming Headset
description: Dual chamber drivers, aluminum frame, detachable noise cancellation mic, memory foam ear cushions, multi-platform compatibility, 3.5mm connection.

reviews.title: Most comfortable headset
reviews.comment: Can wear these for 8+ hours without discomfort. Sound quality is excellent for the price.

reviews.title: Great for PS5 and Switch
reviews.comment: Works perfectly with all my consoles. Mic quality is clear according to my teammates.
